timeline.message:
Create new roles GROUPOBSERVER, RESOURCEOBSERVER, and FACILITYOBSERVER

* I created three new roles, which should serve as observing variant for Group admin, Resource admin and Facility admin.
* For Group observer I also had to edit method "addAllSubgroupsToAuthzRoles", where are some more privilege settings for Group admin.
